page.title: 17* PUPILS LIKES & DISLIKES *
page.content:
{LIKES AND DISLIKES OF A TYPICAL TEN { YEAR OLD ST. KEVINS PUPIL.
1 * HAS A DIGITAL QUARTZ WATCH 2 * LIKES COOKING AND SWIMMING 3 * LIKES COFFEE AND SHANDY 4 * LIKES THE RECORDER AND POP MUSIC AND "WHAM" 5 * THEIR FAVOURITE COLOUR IS RED 6 * THEY LIKE SPAIN AND SALT AND VINEGAR CRISPS 7 * WATCH "THE YOUNG ONES" ON TV BUT READ BOOKS ABOUT ANIMALS 8 * THE MOST POPULAR COMPUTER IS THE SPECTRUM ZX48K 9 * MOST LIKE LIONS BUT DISLIKE SLUGS AND SPIDERS 10 * HALF SAID THEY LIKE SCHOOL AND HALF SAID THEY DISLIKE SCHOOL
{BY ROWENA CULLEN AND AMANDA VALEINIS {AGED 10 OF ST. KEVINS MIDDLE SCHOOL.
